document_data.caption: A map of the Burning Lands of Zakhara.
document_data.name: Burning Lands
document_data.mainbody: The '''Burning Lands''' referred to a specific area in [[Zakhara]] where the northern reaches of the [[Haunted Lands]] bordered other major geographical features in the region.
document_data.Geography: This extremely arid region effectively separated the vast expanse of the [[Great Anvil]] in the south from the [[Weeping Desert]], the [[Genies' Garden]], and the fortress of [[Krak al-Niraan]] by [[1367 DR]].{{AQ-time}} The [[Furrowed Mountains]] enveloped the Burning Lands from the north and west.
